Title: Mazeppa
Writer: Bartabas (story), Claude-Henri Buffard, Bartabas, Claude-Henri Buffard (dialogue), Bartabas (dialogue), Homeric (dialogue)
Actors: Miguel Bosé, Bartabas, Brigitte Marty, Eva Schakmundes
Plot: Based on Lord Byron's poem "Mazeppa" from 1819 and revolving around the painter Théodore Géticault, famous horse trainer and spectacle Bartabas takes art to another level.
